thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-FDM Group (Holdings) Says FY Revenue 233.6 mln Stg, Up 23 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-FDM Group (Holdings) Says FY Revenue 233.6 mln Stg, Up 23 pct
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Fdm Group (Holdings) Plc:
* FDM GROUP (HOLDINGS) PLC SAYS FY REVENUE 233.6 MILLION STG, UP 23 PERCENT
* FDM GROUP (HOLDINGS) PLC SAYS FY PROFIT BEFORE TAX OF 43.7 MILLION STG VERSUS 35.3 MILLION STG IN 2016
* FDM GROUP (HOLDINGS) PLC SAYS FY BASIC EARNINGS PER SHARE 29.8 PENCE
* FDM GROUP (HOLDINGS) PLC SAYS FY ADJUSTED BASIC EARNINGS PER SHARE 32.6P PENCE
* FDM GROUP (HOLDINGS) PLC SAYS FY ORDINARY DIVIDEND PER SHARE 26.0 PENCE VERSUS 19.6P PENCE IN 2016 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
